text: Madeleine Ayinkamiye was a Rwandan politician. She was appointed Minister of Social Affairs in 1964, making her the first-ever female cabinet minister in Rwanda. Ayinkamiye served in ministerial office from 6 January 1964 to 8 November 1965. She was the only woman government minister in Rwanda between Rwanda's independence in 1962 and April 1992. ==References== Category:Year of birth missing Category:Possibly living people Category:Government ministers of Rwanda Category:Women government ministers of Rwanda
title: Madeleine Ayinkamiye
